list_definition.definition: a person who looks after sheep

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The shepherd and his dog gathered in the sheep.

list_definition.definition: (often with around, in, out etc) to guide or lead carefully

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He shepherded me through a maze of corridors.
